page.title: 17Retired Couples food for day
page.content: We asked one couple to record their meals during one particular day with costs. This was not a typical day as they had a visit for lunch and tea. They live in a modern house with superb views across to Horsmonday and beyond. In their large terraced garden they grow flowers & produce for the house. Teasmade in bed l5p. Breakfast, apples and blackberries homegrown stewed with honey,toast,lowfat spread, homemade marmalade and coffee 70p. Lunch with one guest - sherry 1.00, asparagas quiche,runner beans from garden 3.00, cauflower in parsley sauce 75p. Apple snow made with eggs & cream 1.25. Brie and cheddar cheese & biscuits 50p. White wine & coffee 2.80. Tea - homemade cakes & date slice 65p. Supper scrab bled eggs,home grown tomatoes.35p Cocoa & chocolate biscuits 35p.
